uiLookAt

public void uiLookAt(double[] eye,
                     double[] lookat,
                     double[] up,
                     boolean setDefault)
Description copied from interface: VisCameraManager
called in response to user interface actions that want to change the camera position, for example DefaultEventHandler, to handle pans. This is an "absolute" command, in that the camera position requested is the ultimate goal position of the camera.

Specified by:
uiLookAt in interface VisCameraManager

uiRotate

public void uiRotate(double[] q)
Description copied from interface: VisCameraManager
Called in response to user interface actions that result in rotations. In contrast to uiLookAt, this command is "cumulative"; the goal camera position should be adjusted by this amount.

Specified by:
uiRotate in interface VisCameraManager
